Player History
Was claimed off waivers by Colorado on 2/9/2015.
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/13/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/6/2016, off Martin Perez (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/2016, off Glen Perkins (MIN)...
Injured on 6/8/2017 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/29/2017 with a Fractured Finger, out for 3 weeks...
2/2/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Detroit to Washington on 4/1/2019 (Going to WAS: RF Avisail Garcia. Going to DET: RF Jorge Soler, P Michael Strader)...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/13/2021 with a Broken Knee, out for full season...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 7/8/2022 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 4 weeks...
10/28/2022: Signed a contract extension with Washington, $15,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2023, hitting .407 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (A) on 2/2/2025 to a 2-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2025, hitting .458 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/2/2027 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Milwaukee on 5/26/2028...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/5/2029 to a 3-year deal worth $4,844,444 per year...
